3.4. Step 1: Deﬁne Problem 19
experiment. You are running experiments and iterating quickly, but if you are sloppy, then you
cannot trust any of your results. This is especially important when it comes to the design of
your test harness for evaluating candidate models. Let’s take a closer look at each step of the
process.
